current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the extension of preferential tariff
		  treatment for certain textile goods imported from Nicaragua.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Nicaraguan Tariff Preference Level
			 Extension Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Extension of
			 tariff preference level program for Nicaragua

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall proclaim an extension until December
			 31, 2024, of the preferential tariff treatment for apparel goods imported from
			 Nicaragua—

text.#text:
described in U.S.
			 Note 15 to subchapter XV of chapter 99 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the
			 United States; and

provided for
			 under Annex 3.28 of the Dominican Republic–Central America–United States Free
			 Trade Agreement and the letters described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:a/p:2/sp:A
Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:a/p:2/sp:B

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1634(a)(2) of the Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of
			 2006
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:a/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply with respect to the
			 one-for-one purchasing rule described in paragraph (7)(b) of that letter in
			 each year after the extension pursuant to subsection (a) of the preferential
			 tariff treatment described in that subsection.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1634(a)(2)(A) of the Miscellaneous
			 Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:a/p:2/sp:A

text.#text:
The limitation specified in 
            clause (iv) of paragraph
			 (7)(b) of the letter
           described in

header.#text:
Limitation on
			 application of one-for-One purchasing rule for cotton woven
			 trousers

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1634(c) of the Miscellaneous Trade
			 and Technical Corrections Act of 2006
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:c

header.#text:
Amendment to
			 Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:c/p:1

quote.#text:
under the Nicaraguan tariff preference
			 level program
provided in Annex 3.28 of the Agreement
under the Nicaraguan tariff preference level program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Miscellaneous Trade and Technical Corrections Act of 2006/s:1634/ss:c/p:2

quote.#text: provided in Annex 3.28 of the Agreement
under the Nicaraguan tariff preference level program

text.#text:
by adding at the
			 end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Nicaraguan
				Tariff Preference Level Extension Act of
				2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Nicaraguan Tariff Preference Level Extension Act of 2013

term.#tail:
means the
				preferential tariff treatment provided for under Annex 3.28 of the Agreement
				and extended pursuant to the

header.#text:
Nicaraguan
				tariff preference level program defined
